name: Mini Sunkissed Blush & Bronze 3pc Kit
about: What it is:A no-makeup, makeup kit that warms the complexion with a pop of nude color and contains everything you need to bronze, sculpt, and blush...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Inspired by the iconic, bestselling, award-winner, and a celebrity most-loved shade, Sunkissed, the Sunkissed Blush & Bronze Three-Piece Mini Kit is a limited-edition set that features the original Nudies Matte All Over Face Bronze Color in Sunkissed, and curated Nudies Matte All Over Face Bronze Color in Sunkissed Cool, and Nudies Matte All Over Face Blush Color in Sunkissed Pink..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Mini Nudies Matte All Over Face Bronze Color in Sunkissed Cool:.Diisostearyl Malate, Dimethicone, Polybutene, Caprylyl Methicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Synthetic Wax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyethylene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Kaolin, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hexylene Glycol [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].. .Mini Nudies Matte All Over Face Blush Color in Sunkissed Pink:.Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Caprylyl Methicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Synthetic Wax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Kaolin, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140)]...Mini Nudies Matte All Over Face Bronze Color in Sunkissed Cool:.Diisostearyl Malate, Dimethicone, Polybutene, Synthetic Wax, Caprylyl Methicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Kaolin, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Silica, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Red 40 Lake (Ci 16035)]. ..Contains pigments not suitable for the eye area in the USA. Please review before use...NUDESTIX formulations are updated from time to time as part of the brandu2019s commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Get the Look:.-Apply Sunkissed as a bronzer on highpoints of the face where the sun usually hits for an all- over healthy, tanned look..-Stipple Sunkissed Cool as a contour to define cheekbones..-Shade around the forehead or jawline then swipe onto eyelids as a subtle nude shadow..-Add Sunkissed Pink onto cheeks for a natural flush of color then press onto lips to add a subtle tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this kit but it was a disappointment. The colors are ashy and does not blend well. It disappears. I will not be using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mini sunkissed blush and bronze! It blends beautifully into the skin, giving a natural, flushed look that lasts all day. Unlike other blushes I've tried, itu2019s smooth and lightweight, with no patchiness. The formula is buildable, so I can go from a subtle glow to a more intense color, and it works perfectly for my skin tone.  Itu2019s also compact and travel-friendly, making it easy to apply on-the-go. Plus, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin or clog pores. Iu2019d definitely buy it again and recommend it to my friends and family. This blush is a total game-changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is actually super versatile. I like that. It comes in different shades That compliment each other, sunkissed, sunkissed cool and sunkissed pink. The packaging is super dope. It came in an awesome black tin which they all fit nicely in and are easy to travel with. They seem to have a decent amount of product per stick. if youu2019re not going super heavy on the daily with them they would last a pretty long time. I liked personally that they were subtle and blendable. When I first used it I was like u201cOHHHH LAWDu201d because it looked like I was going to have a straight up line on my face BUT they blend incredibly well and are super subtle if you want them to but you can build and make a more dramatic look. They go on super smooth, even smoother than my Milk lip and cheek stick which is usually my go to. Overall Iu2019d say theyu2019re versatile, smooth as butter and great complimentary colors. The only con I would say is that if youu2019re not experienced with makeup they might be a little bit intimidating. Overall 8/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Nudestix Mini Sunkissed Blush & Bronze 3pc Kit, and while I liked it overall, it didnu2019t quite live up to my expectations in terms of pigmentation.  The shades are absolutely beautiful and perfect for achieving that natural, sun-kissed look. The creamy formula blends effortlessly and feels light on the skin, making it a great option for everyday wear. I also love the convenience of the compact sizeu2014itu2019s perfect for on-the-go touch-ups or travel.  However, I found that the pigmentation was a bit too sheer for my liking. I had to layer the product a few times to get the color payoff I wanted, which is fine for a subtle look but not ideal if youu2019re going for a bolder effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love these, formula is awesome and they are all beautiful. stays for a good amount of time. not streaky, and very good pigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the blush and bronzer. Im not usually a bronzer user but I always wear blush. The texture is creamy so it doesnt take much effort to blend. The color is light and long lasting. The bronzer is also a light enough color that it doesnt look too overwhelming.  My skin tone is more on the neutral tan btw.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for light to medium skin tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these colors and cream the product is. These colors would make the perfect blushes for me but are too light to be bronzers on my skin (medium to deep).

reviews.review_title: Effortless Glow in a Portable Kit!

reviews.review_text: This is is such a perfect addition to my makeup routine! The cream formulas are super easy to blend, and they give me the most natural, sunkissed glow without any harsh lines. The shades are so flattering and versatileu2014they work well with my skin tone and give me that fresh, bronzy look Iu2019m always going for. Plus, the mini size is perfect for throwing in my bag for touch-ups throughout the day. I highly recommend this kit if you love quick, easy, and natural makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: After trying the product a few times, I love the creaminess and application of the product. I have a deeper skintone and the pink shade is a great blush for me. I'm very happy and satisfied with this product and it's results after using them! I'm most definitely going to purchase this product, and I do recommend to others to try this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a blush trio. I wouldnu2019t consider the deepest shade a u201cbronzeru201d. I wish it came with a brush for application. Not very much product but they were nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I particularly like that I can use them for different areas of my face, making them a really useful product. 10/10! Great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

These made me want to try more from this brand. I would recommend this if you're looking for cream blush/contour.

reviews.review_title: Light application, wish it came with a mini brush!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product consistently for a couple weeks trialing application in a few different ways, and found that I liked using it best as an underpainting before tinted serums etc. and brought out such a more natural rosey highlight than I expected! I was initially skeptical of what the texture would be like because I hate feeling cakey, but it was surprisingly light. The small size is so perfect for throwing in a clutch on the go, I just wish it came with a mini brush too or something as itu2019s def not one that easily applies well with your fingers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

The tones themselves are pretty good for my fair-er skin, and stays on well. Would buy again. Cute packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Would be better with a less orange-y bronzer!

reviews.review_text: Thank you to NudeStix for allowing me to try this product for free! I really like the consistency of the stix and the packaging, I just wish the colors suited me better. The lighter bronzing color is a bit too orange for me, and the darker shade almost has a mauve tint to it that looks more like blush on me. I do love the color of the blush in the set, though. I also love that the travel tin they come in has a mirror on the inside! Genius! I would love to try other products from this brand, but maybe in different colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is creamy and blends well. The blush colors were beautiful. My only issue was that the bronzer was not dark  enough for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cool concept I lived being able to use it for my eyes cheeks and lips and itu2019s small enough to go inside of a cute little bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

I wish the blush color was less pink because I feel like it doesn't go as well with the other colors, but I just add more of the other colors on top of it. The tin it comes in is pretty cute as well, I put my lipstick and gloss in it and bring it in my purse to reapply throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried few times and The colors are standard and fits wide shades of skin. Got to apply decent quantity to see the highlights.Price is perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Blending with a sponge ended up erasing the color entirely, but using my fingers was the best way to leave a gorgeous hue behind. This will be perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product last few weeks. Mostly I used it as lipstick. I like it. This product has soft texture. Its easy to apply. This product is well pigmented. Basically I'm satisfied. I will recommend it to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received as part of a promotion but so far i really like them, the creaminess of the contour sticks is my favorite part. They spread nicely, however one broke already and now i feel like i cant even use the stick so that's definitely a downside.

reviews.review_title: Efficient add-in to the work ready beautician
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These sticks have a creamy and soft texture, they're super blendable and don't create cracks or dry up. I would compare it to the Charlotte Tillbury Colour Chameleon. This works beautifully on the lips and cheeks. They are nice hues for the eyes but if you have creased eyes like mine, the product accumulates along the creases and forms a line. I wouldn't really recommend it for the eyes. I do like the compact size, so I can take these with me on the go and touch up on my lips/cheeks as needed. The bottom twists to push the product up and you can twist opposingly to retract it (some products do not have that feature). I would buy this product again because it is convenient, I am a rather lazy person and this meets all the necessary needs to go out so it facilitates my morning ritual. It also smells quite decent. I've bought from nudestix before and they've never failed me. I'd recommend it to others as it's an easy product to use, the colors are pretty and natural, and it's travel sized. I received this product for exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the product, but I had to knock off a few stars because it is not for everyone. If you are any darker than tan these colors will probably not show up on you. Also, none of the shades really worked as a bronzer for me; the bronzer shade did give a nice flushed blush look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix sent me this as a free gift. I love the shades. Didnu2019t quite match my skin tone but was great for underpainting. The more pink shade was great for blush! Canu2019t wait to try the other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this product and it hasnu2019t left my purse since I got it. Itu2019s super compact, comes in a cute little case, and gives me the perfect flush of color for any occasion. All three shades work so well for both lips and cheeks, but Iu2019ve been especially loving the sun-kissed bronze on my lips u2014 it gives me total 90s vibes. If youu2019re someone who likes to touch up on the go or just wants an easy pop of color in a hurry, this is a must-have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

However the other two colors are great to use as a blush/bronzer, which I have been loving lately. The pigment is buildable. Okay for daytime and nighttime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with these! I use the bronzer as blush, and it gives me such a natural glow. The colors are absolutely beautiful!

reviews.review_title: I reach for it daily and not just as a blush
reviews.review_text: I found that the cream formulas blend beautifully into the skin, leaving a natural, sunkissed glow. Itu2019s also a great lipstick giving you a cohesive monochromatic look with minimal effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Blends beautifully and does not get oily or separate in contact with other makeup. Natural enough to wear on its own!   It's not super pigmented, so I feel like I use a LOT at a time, so I'm not sure how long it will last, but I'm enjoying it - and it means it's easy to layer multiple colors. reviews.review_text: The Nudestix Mini Nudies Blush & Bronze Glow Kit is a total game-changer for anyone who loves makeup on the go. This cute little black tin comes with a mirror and three mini sticks: a blush, a bronzer, and a highlighter. They're perfect for throwing in your bag and touching up throughout the day.  The blush is super creamy and blends like a dream, giving you a natural flush that you can easily build up if you want more color. The bronzer adds just the right amount of warmth and dimension without looking fake or too orange. And the highlighter? It's honestly the star of the show. It gives you this gorgeous, dewy glow without any chunky glitter.  Whatu2019s really great is how long these last. Once you put them on, they stay put for hours. Theyu2019re also water-resistant, so they're great even in hot weather. Plus, theyu2019re made with good-for-you ingredients like shea butter and vitamin E, and they donu2019t have any of those nasty chemicals.  For the price, you really get a lot. These mini sizes are generous and will last a while, even if you use them every day. If you love makeup thatu2019s easy to use and travel-friendly, this kit is definitely worth it. Itu2019s a must-have for simplifying your beauty routine without sacrificing any of the glam.
